revised_title: Abbreviation of Development in Molgulid Tunicates
tldr: The author examines the development of 24 species of Molgulid tunicates, focusing on the abbreviated development in certain members of the family. They discuss the influence of viviparity and yolk accumulation on development and the general biology of these forms. The study reveals differences in development between various Molgulid species, with some exhibiting direct development and others having a tadpole-like larva.
scientific_discipline: Biology and Life Sciences > Zoology > Developmental Biology
